feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the shirt and pants creates an effortlessly stylish look that is perfect for casual occasions.
feedback.color: The light blue and olive green color combination is refreshing and on-trend. The tan accessories complement the outfit nicely.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals add a touch of elegance to the casual ensemble and elongate the legs.
feedback.accessories: The leather satchel is a practical and stylish choice that ties the look together.
feedback.style: Overall, this outfit achieves a chic, casual vibe that is both comfortable and fashionable.

feedback.fit: The fitted shirt tucked into the loose shorts creates a balanced silhouette that flatters the figure.
feedback.color: The neutral beige and light blue color scheme is perfect for a summer day and easy to mix and match with other pieces.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals complement the casual outfit and add a touch of height.
feedback.accessories: While the outfit lacks accessories, the simplicity allows the individual pieces to shine.
feedback.style: This casual summer look is perfect for a day out with friends or running errands in style.

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy silhouette of the blouse and pants creates a relaxed and comfortable look that is perfect for summer.
feedback.color: The vibrant floral print adds a pop of color to the neutral gray pants, while the yellow sandals provide a fun and unexpected accent.
feedback.footwear: The strappy yellow sandals are a great choice for this outfit, as they add a playful touch and tie in with the colors of the blouse.
feedback.accessories: While the outfit doesn't include any accessories, the bold print and colorful shoes make a statement on their own.
feedback.style: This bohemian chic look is perfect for a summer day out or a casual event. The combination of prints and colors creates a stylish and eye-catching ensemble.

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy fit of the dress creates a comfortable and flattering silhouette that is perfect for a casual day out.
feedback.color: The black and white polka dot print is a classic pattern that never goes out of style, while the pops of yellow and pink add a fun and playful touch.
feedback.footwear: The pink ankle boots are an unexpected choice that adds a touch of edginess to the feminine dress.
feedback.accessories: The yellow crossbody bag is a great addition to the outfit, as it ties in with the yellow accents in the dress and provides a practical way to carry essentials.
feedback.style: This retro chic look is both stylish and comfortable, making it perfect for a variety of occasions. The combination of the polka dot dress and colorful accessories creates a fun and eye-catching ensemble.

labels.fit: Loose, oversized top and fitted shorts

feedback.fit: The oversized shirt paired with the fitted lace shorts creates an interesting contrast in proportions that is both comfortable and stylish.
feedback.color: The mint green and white color combination is fresh and perfect for summer, while the black sandals ground the look.
feedback.footwear: The black strappy sandals are a classic choice that elongates the legs and complements the casual outfit.
feedback.accessories: While the outfit lacks accessories, the simplicity allows the individual pieces and colors to stand out.
feedback.style: This casual chic look is perfect for a summer day out or a lunch date with friends. The combination of the oversized shirt and lace shorts creates a stylish and effortless ensemble.

labels.bottom_type: Black and white polka dot shorts

feedback.fit: The fitted t-shirt tucked into the loose polka dot shorts creates a balanced silhouette that is both comfortable and flattering.
feedback.color: The neutral beige top pairs well with the black and white polka dot shorts, while the blue sandals add a pop of color.
feedback.footwear: The blue platform sandals are a fun and unexpected choice that adds height and interest to the casual outfit.
feedback.accessories: While the outfit doesn't include any accessories, the bold polka dot print and colorful shoes make a statement on their own.
feedback.style: This casual retro look is perfect for a summer day out or a picnic in the park. The combination of the polka dot shorts and platform sandals creates a playful and stylish ensemble.

feedback.fit: The fitted top of the dress combined with the flowy skirt creates a flattering silhouette that accentuates the waist.
feedback.color: The gray dress serves as a neutral base, allowing the pink belt to add a pop of color and the black combat boots to provide an edgy contrast.
feedback.footwear: The black combat boots are an unexpected choice that adds a tough, edgy vibe to the feminine dress.
feedback.accessories: The pink belt is a great addition to the outfit, as it cinches the waist and adds a touch of color to the neutral dress.
feedback.style: This edgy casual look is perfect for someone who wants to add a bit of attitude to their everyday style. The combination of the feminine dress and tough combat boots creates an interesting and stylish contrast.

feedback.fit: The fitted sleeveless top paired with the flowy pleated skirt creates a balanced and flattering silhouette that highlights the waist.
feedback.color: The vibrant yellow and green color combination is eye-catching and perfect for summer. The black accents in the outfit provide a grounding contrast.
feedback.footwear: The yellow ankle strap heels are a perfect match for the top and clutch, creating a cohesive and stylish look from head to toe.
feedback.accessories: The yellow clutch is a great addition to the outfit, as it ties in with the top and shoes and provides a practical way to carry essentials.
feedback.style: This colorful chic look is perfect for a summer event or a day out in the city. The combination of the bright colors and feminine silhouette creates a stylish and memorable ensemble.

labels.fit: Loose, boxy top and fitted skirt

feedback.fit: The loose, boxy fit of the sweater contrasts nicely with the fitted pleated skirt, creating an interesting play on proportions.
feedback.color: The bold combination of yellow, magenta, and leopard print is daring and eye-catching, making a strong fashion statement.
feedback.footwear: The leopard print pumps add an extra layer of visual interest to the outfit and tie in with the bold color scheme.
feedback.accessories: The magenta clutch complements the skirt perfectly and provides a practical way to carry essentials.
feedback.style: This bold and eclectic look is not for the faint of heart, but it is perfect for someone who loves to experiment with fashion and make a statement. The combination of bright colors and mixed prints creates a unique and memorable ensemble.

labels.fit: Loose, oversized t-shirt and fitted shorts

feedback.fit: The oversized t-shirt paired with the fitted denim shorts creates a relaxed and comfortable silhouette that is perfect for a casual day out.
feedback.color: The white and black color scheme is classic and versatile, while the pops of blue in the shoes and hat add a cool and sporty touch.
feedback.footwear: The blue suede ankle boots are an unexpected choice that adds a touch of edginess to the casual outfit.
feedback.accessories: The blue baseball cap is a great addition to the outfit, as it ties in with the blue shoes and provides sun protection.
feedback.style: This casual sporty look is perfect for running errands, attending a sporting event, or hanging out with friends. The combination of the graphic t-shirt, denim shorts, and cool accessories creates a laid-back and stylish ensemble.
